title: Elsa Hosk sports chunky boots with chain purse attached as she grabs treats from Milk Bar in NYC
text:
She and her boyfriend Tom Daly continuously push the envelope when it comes to fashion.

And on Sunday, Elsa Hosk stepped out in an eclectic ensemble as she grabbed treats from Milk Bar in NYC.

The 30-year-old sported a pair of chunky, mid-calf boots adorned with a coin purse-like attachment.

On her way! On Sunday, Elsa Hosk, 30, stepped out in an eclectic ensemble as she grabbed treats from Milk Bar in NYC

Elsa layered a casual top underneath a satin dress.

The supermodel kept warm beneath a tan coat, and added a pair of tights to her look.

Elsa accessorized with a pair of upturned shades, and kept her make-up neutral.

Her look: Elsa layered a casual top underneath a satin dress

Interesting: The beautiful blonde sported a pair of chunky, mid-calf boots adorned with a coin purse-like attachment

Elsa is currently dating boyfriend Tom Daly, whom she reportedly began dating three years ago.

The star's boyfriend shared a photo of the couple together together around Halloween 2015.

The duo appear to be a perfect match, as both share a love for the arts. Elsa is a supermodel, while her boyfriend is the founder of District Vision, a company that focuses on holistic-inspired products for runners.

Simplicity: Elsa accessorized with a pair of upturned shades, and kept her make-up neutral

Elsa began her modeling career at 14, after her father submitted snaps of his daughter to agencies.

After high school, she decided to pursue professional women's basketball, but eventually chose modeling. Her difficult workouts helped prepare her for her career as a model.

She later moved to New York City and eventually began modeling for Victoria's Secret.
description: She and her boyfriend Tom Daly continuously push the envelope when it comes to fashion. On Sunday, Elsa Hosk stepped out in an eclectic ensemble as she grabbed treats from Milk Bar in NYC.
